item.title: The Game-Changing Feature That All Teams Need: Blur Your Background!
item.description: Introduction In today’s world of remote work, video conferencing has become a critical tool for team collaboration. As teams increasingly rely on video conferencing to stay connected, it’s important to have the right tools and features to ensure everyone is comfortable and productive. One of the most important features to consider is the ability to blur your background during video calls. What Is Blur Your Background? Blur your background is a feature that allows you to blur out your background during video calls.
